name: Sword of the New World: Granado Espada
name_original: Sword of the New World: Granado Espada
description:
Sword of the New World: Granado Espada is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by IMC Games. It came out on 10-07-2007. K2 Network published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Sword of the New World: Granado Espada on PC.
